headline: Tesla and 3 More Mag 7 Stocks Report Earnings This Week. What the Options Market Predicts.
summary: Investors can look at options markets to see what traders expect from stocks after earnings reports.  The most aggressive investors can even take bets on what the market thinks about post-earnings volatility.  Having an options straddle position means simultaneously buying a call option, which gives the holder the right to buy shares of a company at a fixed price at a date in the future, and a put option, which gives the holder the right to sell shares at a date in the future.
